newsletterText.message: Learn about upcoming events and updates.

feedbackLink.description: Link that takes you to a form where you can share feedback about PREreview.org (what worked well on the site, what didn’t, etc.).

menuHeading.description: Heading for a list of links about PREreview, such as its Code of Conduct and Privacy Policy.

contactHeading.description: Heading for a list of ways to contact PREreview.

zenodo.message: PREreviews are available in our <community>Zenodo Community</community> and the <api>Zenodo API</api>.
